title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     January 26, 2016  Park to Recruit Volunteers  Lake Meredith NRA and Alibates Flint Quarries NM is recruiting volunteers.   October 05, 2015  October Star Party  Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument will host a Star Party on Saturday, October 10.   August 12, 2015  Alibates Flint Quarries NM Celebrates 50th Anniversary  Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument will honor the 50th anniversary of the establishment of the first national monument in Texas on August 29, 2015.   July 24, 2015  August Star Party  Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument will host a Star Party on Saturday, August 15.   May 30, 2015  Wildflower Weekend at Lake Meredith National Recreation Area and Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument  Lake Meredith National Recreation Area will host the first ever Wildflower Weekend Friday, June 5th beginning at 7:00 p.m. at Alibates Visitor Center.   May 20, 2015  May Star Party  Professor Arthur Schneider, Director of Renewable Energy at Amarillo College, will give an interpretive program on the night sky and stars of the Texas Panhandle.   April 22, 2015  NATIONAL JUNIOR RANGER DAY APRIL 25, 2015  Lake Meredith National Recreation Area and Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument will celebrate National Junior Ranger Day this Saturday, April 25, at the Alibates Visitor Center.   April 17, 2015  LAKE MEREDITH NATIONAL RECREATION AREA PROPOSES NEW OFF-ROAD VEHICLE RULES  The National Park Service invites public comment on proposed rule to revise off-road vehicle regulations at Lake Meredith National Recreation Area.   March 20, 2015  Record of Decision Signed for Lake Meredith National Recreation Area and Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument  Superintendent Robert Maguire is pleased to announce the release of the Record of Decision for the General Management Plan for Lake Meredith National Recreation Area and Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument.   March 06, 2015  Prescribed Fire Planned For Lake Meredith National Recreation Area, March 8-31  Fire managers plan to continue prescribed burns at Lake Meredith National Recreation Area beginning the week of March 8, 2015.   March 04, 2015  Alibates Visitor Center Temporary Closing  Alibates Visitor Center will be closed March 9-20, 2015, for renovation and installation of new displays.   February 27, 2015  Summer Youth Work Program at Lake Meredith National Recreation Area  Lake Meredith National Recreation Area will conduct a summer youth work program under the authority of the Youth Conservation Corps.   February 17, 2015  Prescribed Fire Planned for Lake Meredith National Recreation Area  Lake Meredith National Recreation Area will conduct multiple prescribed burns between the dates of February 19 and March 31, 2015.   January 21, 2015  OFF-ROAD VEHICLE PLAN COMPLETED FOR LAKE MEREDITH NATIONAL RECREATION AREA  Superintendent Robert Maguire is pleased to announce the completion of the Off-Road Vehicle Management Plan (ORV Plan) for Lake Meredith National Recreation Area
